{{disambig-more|Amazon|[[Amazon (disambiguation)]]}}
[[Image:Amazon MGM Studios logo.png|thumb|175px|right|Amazon MGM Studios logo]]
'''Amazon MGM Studios''', formerly known as '''Amazon Studios''', is an American television and film producer and distributor that is a subsidiary of [[Amazon.com Incorporated|Amazon]]. It specializes in developing television series and distributing and producing films.
[[File:Amazon Studios logo.png|thumb|200px|Amazon Studios logo]] 
The company has produced the first season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', while the second season is currently in production.
